title: Can the Grizzlies Catch Up to the Struggling Warriors? Plus, the Mavericks Are Surging. | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja dig into whether the Grizzlies can make a Finals run this season (2:00) as the Warriors have faltered in recent weeks (6:00), what has changed for the positive with the Mavericks (15:00), and what KD’s return means for the Nets (23:00).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Producer: Sasha Ashall
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
